text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Advertising purposes" means the purpose of propagandizing in connection with the commercial:
sale of a product;
offering of a service; or
exhibition of entertainment.

"Sadomasochistic abuse" means:
flagellation or torture committed by or inflicted on an individual who is:
nude;
wearing only undergarments; or
wearing a revealing or bizarre costume; or
binding, fettering, or otherwise physically restraining an individual who is:
nude;
wearing only undergarments; or
wearing a revealing or bizarre costume.

"Sexual conduct" means:
human masturbation;
sexual intercourse; or
whether alone or with another individual or animal, any touching of or contact with:
the genitals, buttocks, or pubic areas of an individual; or
breasts of a female individual.

"Sexual excitement" means:
the condition of the human genitals when in a state of sexual stimulation;
the condition of the human female breasts when in a state of sexual stimulation; or
the sensual experiences of individuals engaging in or witnessing sexual conduct or nudity.
